painPoints: Sensor stops tracking intermittently even at 8000Hz
Dongle did not work on the first unit received
Issue persists even when plugged in
improvementSuggestions: Improve sensor reliability at high polling rates
Sample 1.CoT_reasoning: The feedback directly addresses critical functional aspects of the product (sensor and dongle), which are core to the user experience. The issues described are specific and actionable, making the feedback highly relevant.

painPoints: Not worth the price compared to cheaper alternatives
Similar performance achievable with lower-spec products
improvementSuggestions: Adjust pricing to better reflect value
Highlight unique features that justify the cost
Sample 2.CoT_reasoning: The feedback discusses the product's value proposition and performance, which are relevant to potential buyers. While the user acknowledges the product's quality, their focus on price-performance comparison provides useful insights for pricing strategy and marketing.
